name: Conjurer's Labyrinth
description:
Play as a stylish wizard who possibly has schizophrenia. Meet two cosmic beings that help you on your way and fight a horde of cultists to victory.

The world can change depending on your sanity, so feel free to experiment with that!


Move: WASD

Look Around: Mouse

Jump: Space

Dash: Shift

Strong Attack: Right Mouse

Weak Attack: Left Mouse

Die: Don't press anything

oh yeah controller support exists too
